Hero.heroText: is a trusted car service app connecting vehicle owners with reliable service providers. We offer a wide range of automotive services, including maintenance & repairs, Spare parts, insurance, and more!. With Sayyn, you can easily find, book, and manage all your car care needs through a convenient, user-friendly platform focused on quality and convenience.

S1.title: Service Centers Map
S1.content: Locate and book top-rated service centers nearby, categorized by type (mechanics, tire shops, etc.). Filter based on service type, ratings, and price points to find the best option for your needs. With customer reviews and ratings, you can make informed decisions about where to get your car serviced.

S2.title: Insurance Services
S2.content: Easily renew or issue new car insurance policies through our integrated insurance broker service. Sayyn partners with reputable insurance providers to offer competitive rates. We also simplify the claims process by handling communication between service centers and insurance companies.

S3.title: Emergency Assistance (WINCH)
S3.content: For major breakdowns, Sayyn’s 24/7 winch service will tow your vehicle to the nearest service center. We partner with trusted winch providers to ensure fast, reliable assistance, no matter where you are.

S4.title: Store to Door
S4.content: Need a part or accessory for your vehicle? Sayyn’s store-to-door service delivers car parts and accessories right to your doorstep. Browse our catalog, place an order, and have your items delivered hassle-free.

Soon.title: Portable Car Maintenance
Soon.content: Convenient Service, Anytime, Anywhere, Sayyn’s fleet of equipped vehicles provides on-spot services such as tire changes, battery replacements, and minor repairs. Use the app to schedule a service and track the technician’s arrival in real time. All technicians are certified to guarantee quality.

1.content: Book car services with unparalleled ease, using Sayyn.

2.content: Sayyn handles all your car maintenance needs in one app.

3.content: With Sayyn focus on enjoying your drive, without stress.

4.content: Sayyn provides expert services that meet high standards.

5.title: Availability
5.content: Easy booking and 24/7 service access with Sayyn.

6.content: Sayyn offers clear, upfront pricing with no surprises.

1.title: Our Mission
1.content: Our mission is to revolutionize the car service industry by providing seamless, reliable, and efficient solutions for vehicle owners everywhere. We aim to build long-lasting relationships with our customers through exceptional service, transparency, and trust.

2.title: Our Vision
2.content: Our vision is to be the leading global platform for car services, known for our innovation, customer-centric approach, and commitment to sustainability. We envision a world where car maintenance and repair are hassle-free, giving vehicle owners peace of mind and more time to enjoy the journey.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Our Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: At Sayyn, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you interact with our website, mobile app, or any affiliated platforms.

1.title: Information We Collect
content: Personal Information: Name, phone number, email address, residence area, and details about your transportation vehicle (if applicable).
Usage Data: Information about how you interact with our website or app, including pages visited, time spent, and features used.
Device Information: IP address, device type, operating system, and browser details.
Location Data: Your geolocation, if you enable this feature on our app or website.

2.title: How We Use Your Information
content: To provide and improve Sayyn’s services.
To process your inquiries, bookings, and other requests.
To personalize your experience by recommending relevant services.
To analyze and enhance the performance of our website and app.
To communicate with you regarding updates, promotions, and offers.
To ensure compliance with legal obligations and resolve disputes.

3.title: Third-Party Integrations
content: Payment processors to handle transactions securely.
Marketing or analytics platforms to improve advertising strategies.
Service providers such as towing companies, insurance providers, or repair centers.

We ensure that all third-party partners comply with applicable privacy laws and protect your information. You will be notified if we engage with any additional third parties beyond those mentioned here.

4.title: Sharing Your Information
content: With Partners: To connect you with relevant service providers, such as car repair centers or insurance companies.
For Legal Compliance: If required by law, regulation, or government request.
For Business Transactions: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred to the new entity.
We will not sell or rent your personal information to third parties.

5.title: Data Storage and Security
content: Google Admin Console for secure data management.
Meta Business Suite and Ads Manager for secure lead generation and marketing campaigns.
Encrypted servers to store and process your data.
Data is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law.

6.title: Your Rights
content: Access and Portability: Request a copy of your data in a portable format.
Correction: Update or correct inaccurate information.
Deletion: Request the deletion of your data, subject to legal and operational requirements.
Consent Withdrawal: Withdraw your consent to data collection or specific uses.
Opt-Out: Choose not to receive promotional communications.
To exercise these rights, contact us at cs@sayyn.net.

7.title: Cookies and Tracking
content: Essential Cookies: Required for core website or app functionality.
Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how users interact with Sayyn.
Advertising Cookies: Deliver personalized ads based on your preferences.
You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

8.title: Future Updates and Expansions
content: As Sayyn grows, we may expand our services, partner with new third parties, or introduce new features. These changes may require updates to this Privacy Policy. By continuing to use Sayyn after any updates, you acknowledge and agree to the revised policy.
Provisions for Updates:
1. New third-party integrations will be covered under the existing terms, ensuring all partners adhere to privacy regulations.
2. Future services (e.g., insurance, mobile payments, or roadside assistance) will follow the same data security and usage protocols outlined in this policy.
We will notify users of significant changes through email notifications, app or website announcements, or updated versions of this Privacy Policy accessible on our platform.

9.title: Contact Information
9.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how Sayyn handles your data, please contact us at cs@sayyn.net.

10.title: Effective Date
10.content: This policy is effective as of [10/1/2024]. By using Sayyn, you consent to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as outlined above.

TermsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
TermsAndConditions.intro: Welcome to Sayyn! By using our app, website, or services, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before proceeding. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not use our platform.

1.title: Overview of Sayyn Services
content: Map-Based Service Center Locator: Users can locate car service centers (e.g., maintenance, car care, oil change) and interact with premium service centers offering bookings and guaranteed quality.
Car Spare Parts and Retail Shops: Explore and purchase spare parts categorized by brand, manufacturing year, and quality, with flexible refund options for eligible purchases.
Towing Service (Winch): Order emergency towing services directly from the app.
Insurance Quotas and Marketing: Access insurance offers from broker partners.
Portable Car Services: Request car maintenance services at your home or preferred location.
Payment Solutions: Secure payments through Paymob’s payment gateway, offering multiple payment methods.

2.title: User Responsibilities
content: Provide accurate and up-to-date information when registering or booking services.
Comply with all local laws and regulations when using Sayyn’s services.
Treat Sayyn’s staff, partners, and service providers with respect.
Use Sayyn’s platform only for lawful purposes and not for fraudulent or malicious activities.

3.title: Service Center Premium Listings
content: Sayyn features Premium Service Centers that meet specific quality and service standards.
Premium centers may offer additional booking options, including scheduling appointments or direct visits.

Sayyn does not directly own or manage service centers and is not liable for their actions or omissions. However, Sayyn ensures that premium centers meet strict criteria to provide high-quality services.

4.title: Spare Parts and Refunds
content: Spare parts are categorized as original parts and non-original parts with detailed specifications (e.g., brand, manufacturing year).
Sayyn is not the direct seller of parts but acts as a facilitator between users and spare parts vendors.
Refund Policy: Refunds are subject to vendor-specific terms. Users must comply with refund conditions outlined by the vendor (e.g., return timelines, proof of purchase).
Sayyn will mediate disputes if necessary to ensure fair treatment.

5.title: Towing Services (Winch)
content: Users can request towing services for emergencies through Sayyn’s platform.
The towing service is provided by independent third-party operators.
Sayyn is not liable for delays, damages, or other issues arising during towing services. However, Sayyn will work to resolve complaints with the provider on behalf of the user.

6.title: Insurance Marketing and Brokerage
content: Sayyn markets insurance products offered by broker partners.
All insurance policies are subject to the terms and conditions of the respective broker or insurance company.
Sayyn is not responsible for claims, disputes, or policy management after the user purchases an insurance product.

7.title: Portable Car Services
content: Users can book portable car services to be performed at their home or preferred location.
Services must be requested through the Sayyn app and scheduled as per availability.
Portable services are offered by third-party technicians. Sayyn ensures these providers meet quality standards but is not directly responsible for their actions.

8.title: Payment Solutions
content: Sayyn uses Paymob as its payment gateway to facilitate secure and flexible payment options.
Payment methods include credit cards, debit cards, and other digital payment options.
Sayyn does not store payment details; all transactions are processed securely by Paymob.
In case of payment disputes, users should contact Sayyn support immediately.

9.title: Limitation of Liability
content: Sayyn is a facilitator connecting users with service providers (e.g., service centers, tow operators, spare part vendors). We are not directly responsible for the performance, quality, or delays caused by third-party providers.
Sayyn’s liability is limited to mediating disputes and ensuring compliance with service agreements.
Sayyn is not liable for:
o Any damage to vehicles during service or towing.
o Misuse or incorrect installation of spare parts.
o Delays caused by third-party providers.

10.title: Intellectual Property
content: All content on Sayyn’s app and website, including logos, designs, text, and graphics, is the exclusive property of Sayyn.
Users are prohibited from copying, modifying, or distributing Sayyn’s intellectual property without explicit written consent.

11.title: Service Availability
content: Sayyn strives to ensure uninterrupted access to its platform. However, we do not guarantee continuous availability due to potential technical issues, updates, or third-party service disruptions.

12.title: Termination of Use
content: Sayyn reserves the right to suspend or terminate user accounts for violations of these Terms and Conditions.
Refuse access to the platform for fraudulent or malicious activities.
Remove inappropriate or fraudulent content submitted by users.

13.title: Dispute Resolution
content: Any disputes arising from the use of Sayyn’s platform will be resolved amicably. Users can contact Sayyn support at cs@sayyn.net for assistance.
If disputes cannot be resolved informally, they will be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts of [Egypt].

14.title: Updates to Terms and Conditions
content: Sayyn reserves the right to update these Terms and Conditions to reflect changes in services, regulations, or business practices.
Users will be notified of significant changes via email notifications, app or website announcements.
By continuing to use Sayyn after updates, you agree to the revised terms.

15.title: Contact Information
15.content: For questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at cs@sayyn.net.
